16 #ifndef TTTRLIB_RECORD_TYPES_H
17 #define TTTRLIB_RECORD_TYPES_H

19 #include <cstdint>

21 
23 typedef union pq_hh_t2_record {
24  uint64_t allbits;
25  struct {
26  unsigned timetag :25;
27  unsigned channel :6;
28  unsigned special :1; // or sync, if channel==0
29  } bits;
30 } pq_hh_t2_record_t;
31 
33 typedef union pq_hh_t3_record {
34  uint64_t allbits;
35  struct {
36  unsigned n_sync :10; // number of sync period
37  unsigned dtime :15; // delay from last sync in units of chosen macrotime_resolution
38  unsigned channel :6;
39  unsigned special :1;
40  } bits;
41 } pq_hh_t3_record_t;
42 
44 typedef union ph_ph_t2_record {
45  uint64_t allbits;
46  struct {
47  unsigned time :28;
48  unsigned channel :4;
49  } bits;
50 
51 } pq_ph_t2_record_t;
52 
54 typedef union pq_ph_t3_record {
55  uint64_t allbits;
56  struct {
57  unsigned n_sync :16;
58  unsigned dtime :12;
59  unsigned channel :4;
60  } bits;
61 } pq_ph_t3_record_t;
62 
63 
65 typedef union bh_spc600_256_record{
66  uint64_t allbits;
67  struct {
68  unsigned adc : 8; //
69  unsigned mt : 17;
70  unsigned rout : 3;
71  unsigned empty : 1;
72  unsigned gap : 1;
73  unsigned mtov : 1;
74  unsigned invalid : 1;
75  } bits;
76 } bh_spc600_256_record_t;
77 
78 
80 typedef union bh_spc600_4096_record{
90  uint64_t allbits;
91  struct {
92  unsigned adc : 12;
93  unsigned invalid : 1;
94  unsigned mtov : 1;
95  unsigned gap : 1;
96  unsigned empty : 1;
97  unsigned mt3 : 8;
98  unsigned rout : 8;
99  unsigned mt1 : 8;
100  unsigned mt2 : 8;
101  } bits;
102 } bh_spc600_4096_record_t;
103 
104 
106 typedef union bh_spc130_record{
107  uint64_t allbits;
108  struct {
109  unsigned mt : 12;
110  unsigned rout : 4;
111  unsigned adc : 12;
112  unsigned mark : 1;
113  unsigned gap : 1;
114  unsigned mtov : 1;
115  unsigned invalid : 1;
116  } bits;
117 } bh_spc130_record_t;
118 
119 
121 typedef union bh_overflow{
122  uint64_t allbits;
123  struct {
124  unsigned cnt : 28;
125  unsigned empty : 6;
126  unsigned mtov : 1;
127  unsigned invalid : 1;
128  } bits;
129 } bh_overflow_t;
